entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
